import { useParams, Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGetFlightByIdQuery } from "../../redux/api/flightApi"; import Header from "../Header"; import Footer from "../Footer"; export default function FlightDetail() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); const location = useLocation(); const query = new URLSearchParams(location.search); console.log("Flight Detail Query Params:", Array.from(query.entries())); const from = query.get("from"); const to = query.get("to"); const pax = query.get("pax"); const travelDate = query.get("date"); const travelTime = query.get("time"); const { data, error, isLoading } = useGetFlightByIdQuery({ id, from, to, pax, }); console.log("Flight Detail Data:", data); if (isLoading) return
Loading...
; if (error) return
Error loading flight details
; const flight = data?.flight; const fromAirport = data?.fromAirport; const toAirport = data?.toAirport; if (!flight) return
Flight not found
; // const handleEnquiryClick = () => { // navigate( // `/enquiry?flightId=${id}&from=${from}&to=${to}&pax=${pax}&date=${travelDate}&time=${travelTime}` // ); // }; const handleEnquiryClick = () => { const bookingParams = `?flightId=${id}&from=${from}&to=${to}&pax=${pax}&date=${travelDate}&time=${travelTime}`; const isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem("token"); // check JWT token console.log("User is logged in:", isLoggedIn); if (isLoggedIn) { // Redirect to user dashboard with booking params navigate(`/enquiry${bookingParams}`); } else { // Redirect to login/signup page with booking params navigate(`/login${bookingParams}`); } }; return ( <>

Flight Details

{/* ====== Left Section ====== */}

{flight.name}

  • {travelDate}
  • {travelTime}
  • {pax} Passengers
Speed

{flight.maxSpeed} km/hr

Passengers

{flight.capacity} Person

Travel Time

{flight.travelTime} min

Luggage

{flight.baggage || "N/A"} kg

Mandatory Guidelines for all travellers

Please arrive 30 minutes before departure. Carry a valid government ID. Ensure baggage does not exceed allowed limit.

{/* ====== Right Section ====== */}

Ride Details

{fromAirport?.name} - {toAirport?.name}

location_on

{fromAirport?.name}, {fromAirport?.city},{" "} {fromAirport?.country}

location_on

{toAirport?.name}, {toAirport?.city},{" "} {toAirport?.country}

Distance

location_on

Total Distance: {flight.distance} KM

schedule

Total Duration:{" "} {Math.floor(flight.travelTime / 60)} hr{" "} {flight.travelTime % 60} min

Bill Details

Base Fare
currency_rupee {" "} {flight.price?.toLocaleString() || 1200000}
Taxes & Fees
currency_rupee {" "} {Math.round( (flight.price || 1200000) * 0.12 ).toLocaleString()}
Grand Total
currency_rupee {" "} {Math.round( (flight.price || 1200000) * 1.12 ).toLocaleString()}
{/* Back */}
{/*
Back
*/}
); }
